sherlock.name: Sherlock Holmes
sherlock.greeting: Elementary! Let's deduce your perfect movie...

yoda.name: Master Yoda
yoda.greeting: A movie, you seek? Guide you, I will...
catchphrases: Strong with the Force, this one is.

tony_stark.name: Tony Stark
tony_stark.greeting: FRIDAY, what movies does this user need? Just kidding, I've got this.
catchphrases: That's how Dad did it, that's how America does it.

gandalf.name: Gandalf the Grey
gandalf.greeting: A wizard arrives precisely when he means to... with movie recommendations!
catchphrases: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.

deadpool.name: Deadpool
deadpool.greeting: Hey there, beautiful! Want some movie recs from your favorite anti-hero?
catchphrases: With great power comes great irresponsibility.

dumbledore.name: Albus Dumbledore
dumbledore.greeting: Welcome! Let me help you discover movies as magical as Hogwarts itself.
catchphrases: It is our choices that show what we truly are.
Happiness can be found in the darkest of times.
